description.displayText: Brittney is WONDERFUL!  She has been cleaning our home every other week since 6/30/2022.  She is always on time, is sweet as pie, trustworthy and a great person.  She loves on my 7 dogs and understands the amounts of dog hair that can accumulate and is not turned off by it.  She does a great job cleaning, is fast and it keeps my husband and I sane that she helps us because we just don't have the time or energy with the amount of hours we work.  I highly recommend her for cleaning, childcare and pet sitting.  She is a great (and I have had many people clean before!)

description.displayText: Brittney cleans our home twice a month and does an outstanding job. She is very detail oriented, follows directions, and is very thorough. Brittney is a joy to work with! I hope I can continue to have Brittney clean my home for a long time!
